EmailTemplate.subject: This Month in Spring
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This Month in Spring March 2019 Hi, Spring fans! Welcome to another installment of This Month in Spring!
It's shaping up to be quite the month indeed. I just returned from the epic SpringOne Tour event in Columbus, OH, and now I'm on a jet winging my way to Tel Aviv, Israel. I'll be speaking at the local Java User Group <[[https://eventil.com/events/special-guest-reactive-spring-with-josh-long]]> and meeting customers while I'm there. Then I've got a few live training events that you can still sign up for: the first is on using Kotlin with Spring <[[https://learning.oreilly.com/live-training/courses/spring-boot-and-kotlin/0636920241393/]]> and the second is on testing with Spring <[[https://learning.oreilly.com/live-training/courses/bootiful-testing/0636920241447/]]>. After that, it's off to Atlanta for the seminal DevNexus conference, where I'll have the honor of presenting with the good Dr. Venkat Subramaniam on all things Kotlin—don't miss this!
Then I’ll be in Seattle for the Seattle Java User Group <[[https://www.meetup.com/seajug/events/259287945/]]>, before heading to beautiful Montreal for the amazing Confoo show, where I'll be talking about testing Spring applications <[[https://confoo.ca/en/yul2019/session/bootiful-testing]]>. From there, I’ll go to the SpringOne Tour London <[[https://springonetour.io/2019/london?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-march-2019]]> and Amsterdam stops <[[https://springonetour.io/2019/amsterdam?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-march-2019]]>. I've got a few customer visits after that, and then I’m off to the Kafka Summit in New York City, where I'll be speaking with the legendary Tim Berglund <[[https://twitter.com/tlberglund]]> on all things Kafka and streaming with Kafka and Spring. I'd love to see you there at each of these events! Sign up, subscribe, set a reminder, book a flight, and of course: don't hesitate to say hello on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/starbuxman]]>.
Check out all the Spring highlights by clicking on the link below!
The Long and short of it <[[https://content.pivotal.io/josh-blog/this-month-in-spring-february-2019?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-march-2019]]>
The SpringOne Tour Heads to Europe
In March, the SpringOne Tour goes transatlantic, with stops in London and Amsterdam, before heading to South Africa in April. Visit our tour page <[[https://springonetour.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-march-2019]]> for more information on upcoming stops.
Reserve your seat <[[https://springonetour.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-march-2019]]>
Register for S1P and Submit Your Proposals
Acquiring worms is nice, but saving money has benefits, too. Early Bird registration for SpringOne Platform 2019 in Austin, TX, and discounted training prices end on April 24, 2019 at 11:59pm PDT. Register now <[[https://springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-march-2019]]>—before it's too late!—and save $600. Think of all the worms you could buy with that change!
Do you have a software development story you want to make some noise about? Why not propose a session for SpringOne Platform! Join speakers from the world's leading companies and submit a talk <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2019/cfp?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-march-2019]]> today.
RSVP [or Submit Your Proposal] <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-march-2019]]>
